transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji mujhe ek requirement hai.
Customer: Yaha Gujarat se mujhe maal bhejna hai Kathmandu, Nepal.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Uske liye kya sahayata aapki taraf se mil sakti hai bataye. Do tan maal hai.
Customer: Ah sir aap Shivam ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapne kis number se call kiya hai?
Customer: Uske number se call kiya hai.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai sir?
Customer: Haan us number pe call kiya hai need helpline usme likha hua aaya tha to is number pe call kiya.
Executive: Nahi wo kya hota hai ki jab mera phone nahi lagta hai na tab usse call karna padta hai ye call bhi mere paas hi aaya hai.
Customer: Aap phone bol rahe hain?
Executive: Main Rahul Gurjar baat kar raha hu aapka account manager. Accha accha haan haan haan haan.
Customer: To kya us number pe call karu aisa?
Executive: Haan ab kya usme phone kar dena to wo agar wo mera number nahi lag raha ho to aap isse call kar sakte hain ye kya hai jab account manager response nahi kar raha ho tab kar sakte hain ye call bhi mere pe hi aata hai agar main available honga to mere seedha sir wo pick karenge agar mere team mate pick karenge. Usse kya farak padta hai ab number to yahi hai na need helpline to ye bhi aapke paas hi aa raha hai na mera call bhi.
Executive: Haan matlab ye hai ki jab main jaise ki main aapko assign hu main aapko baat nahi kar pa raha hu aap se baat nahi ho pa rahi mera number busy aa raha hai ya fir main utha nahi raha hu tab aap ispe call kar sakte hain.
Customer: Wo koi baat nahi abhi to aap dekhiye kya isme madad mil sakti hai bataye na.
Executive: Isme sir aapke in hum log ye help kar sakte hain jo IndiaMART se ek aapne waha pe dekha hoga ship with IndiaMART IndiaMART me ek tab aata hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Uspe aap click karoge to aapke yaha se Kathmandu ke jo service provide karte hain transport ki wo bata dega aur kitna price lagta hai wo bhi bata dega.
Customer: Wo kaha se milega?
Executive: Aap IndiaMART IndiaMART pe search karoge ship with IndiaMART usi pe milega aapko.
Customer: Matlab application me milega ya usme net pe dekhna padega.
Executive: Ah ye aap website panel pe hai sir aap?
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Aap IndiaMART ka website panel open kijiye.
Customer: Haan ek minute.
Customer: Ye IndiaMART ka kiya.
Executive: Usme dekhiye sir ship with IndiaMART likha aa raha hoga profile pe click kijiye apni profile likha hoga aapka naam likha hoga waha click karke.
Customer: Kaha ki baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: To main aisa karta hu aapko laptop hai aapke paas abhi?
Customer: Nahi laptop nahi main mobile pe hu field me hu to maine kya mobile pe chalu kiya hua hai application.
Executive: Mobile pe to fir mobile ki aapko screen share karke dikhani padegi mujhe laptop me to mujhe pata hai ki kaha se kaha par hai.
Customer: Kaha par jaise side me teen line hai usko dabaun to usme milega?
Executive: Aap usme teen line hai na naam likh ke aata hai high Shivam uspe click karo.
Executive: Niche likh ke aa raha hai book transport karke kuch book transport karke koi tab aa raha hai?
Customer: Book transport karke to ek minute.
Customer: Nahi ye to mera upar hai na to jaise high Bhavesh Patel likha hai fir home aaya fir trust now fir sale ke pure hai fir buy ke aur fir more hai. Customer support about IndiaMART or setting.
Executive: Waha pe jab aapne high Shivam pe click kiya hoga niche paanch option aa rahe honge buy lead search buy lead manage product uske niche waha pe kahi option aa raha hai aapko book transport karke?
Customer: Sir latest buy lead search buy lead lead manager manage product share product photo subscription plan business loan catalog or ship to IndiaMART.
Executive: Ship with IndiaMART aa raha hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uspe click karo.
Customer: Haan kiya. Usme ab aa raha hoga apni waha pe dekho kitna aapka weight hai kya material hai wo sab detail fill karo aur location fill karo kaha se kaha pe bhejna hai.
Customer: Accha. Hmm.
Customer: Barabar.
Executive: Hello ship with IndiaMART hai na sir usme kya hai pehle apna weight dal dena kitna tan maal bhejna hai aapko is weight ka bata dena kya material hai jaise agriculture commercial industrial wo click kar dena haan theek hai aur fir uske baad sir apni location dal dena jaise aapko Gujarat se bhejna hai Kathmandu theek hai. Kathmandu aapne apna location dal diya ab jaise ispe search karoge search karne ke baad kuch options aayenge aapke jo local area ke jo bhi person hai jo transport service provide karte hain logistic wale jo Nepal apna maal leke jaate hain unki detail aa jayegi wo is rate mein hum yaha Nepal maal le jaate hain usme kya hai sir aapke comparison ho jayega kis rate pe maal ja raha hai bahut sare option show ho jayenge aapke 10 15 option show ho jayenge. Aisa hai ki Kathmandu ka to aa hi nahi raha hai bhaiya.
Executive: Kuch nahi aa raha?
Customer: Nahi Kathmandu ka koi aa hi nahi raha hai option hi nahi aa raha hai India Kathmandu ke alag wo state ho jata hai na wo country alag ho jata hai.
Executive: Chalo main isko check karke bata raha hu aapko call pe kar dunga personal number pe theek hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs assistance sending goods to Kathmandu, Nepal.

- Kathmandu option not showing in Ship with IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use Ship with IndiaMART.

- Executive offered to check and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- shipping, kathmandu, indiamart, transport, location
